title: Aspect Ratio Calculator
description: Enter the original width and height, then set one side to calculate a new size while keeping the same ratio.

helper.original: Enter the pixel size of your original image.
helper.target: Type one side to auto-calculate the other while keeping the ratio.
helper.result: This keeps the original aspect ratio. Copy when ready.

empty: Results appear after you enter values.

openGraph.title: Aspect Ratio Calculator
openGraph.description: Quickly calculate new image sizes that preserve aspect ratio. Perfect for resizing photos, banners, and social media graphics.
